rules: Rule1: If a vehicle is manufactured on a platform, then the platform is functional.
Rule2: Provided that a drug is stored, it is shipped.
Rule3: Whenever a drug is tested, a vehicle is manufactured on a platform.
Rule4: In the event that a drug is analyzed, a vehicle is manufactured on a platform.
Rule5: If a drug is sterile, then it is not contaminated.
Rule6: Given that a drug is distributed, if a vehicle is not manufactured on a platform, then the drug is expired.
Rule7: Whenever a drug is delivered, then if a vehicle is not manufactured on a platform, the drug is expired.
Rule8: Provided that a drug is ordered, it is either distributed or delivered.
Rule9: In the case that a drug is requested, it is either distributed or delivered.
Rule10: If a drug is prescribed, then either it is ordered or it is requested.
Rule11: A drug is prescribed or a drug is recommended.
Rule12: Should a drug be recommended, then it is either ordered or requested.
Rule13: Whenever a job is rescheduled, it is cancelled.
Rule14: Provided that a drug is returned, it is damaged.
Rule15: If a job is scheduled, then if a vehicle is not manufactured on a platform, the drug is approved.
Rule16: In the event that a drug is intact, it is not damaged.
Rule17: If a drug is registered, then it is licensed.
Rule18: In the case that a drug is licensed, then either it is documented or, if it is not the case that whenever the platform is not functional the drug is packaged, then the drug is shipped.
Rule19: Whenever a drug is replaced, it is refunded.
Rule20: Should a job be assigned, then if a vehicle is not manufactured on a platform, the drug is approved.
Rule21: Either a job is delayed or, if a job is completed, then either it is scheduled or it is assigned.
Rule22: Provided that a drug is shipped, it is labeled.
Rule23: In the event that it is not the case that if a drug is quality checked then either it is tested or it is analyzed, then the drug is not rejected.
Rule24: If it is not the case that either a job is scheduled or it is assigned, then the job is rescheduled.
Rule25: Provided that it is not the case that either a job is scheduled or it is assigned, then the job is not cancelled.
Rule26: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if a drug is quality checked then either it is tested or it is analyzed then the drug is rejected, then the drug is recalled.

Rule27: In the case that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if a vehicle is not manufactured on a platform then the drug is approved then the drug is not certified, then the drug is contaminated.
Rule28: Should it not be the case that if it is not the case that if the platform is not functional then the drug is packaged then the drug is shipped, then the drug is returned.
Rule29: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the platform is not functional then the drug is packaged then the drug is shipped, then the drug is replaced.
Rule30: In the event that it is not the case that if a vehicle is not manufactured on a platform then the drug is approved, then the drug is certified.
Rule31: Provided that it is not the case that if the platform is not functional then the drug is packaged, then the drug is stored.
Rule32: If a vehicle is not manufactured on a platform, then the drug is not approved.
facts: Fact1: A drug is quality checked.
Fact6: It is not the case that a drug is recalled.
Fact7: It is not the case that a drug is expired.
Fact8: A drug is not documented.
Fact9: A drug is not refunded.
Fact10: A job is not delayed.
Fact11: It is not the case that a drug is packaged.
Fact12: A drug is not labeled.
